trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>。

trans-unit.source: Information about the button is displayed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的相關資訊會顯示當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>內控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>按下。
